h2_title: The Duskveil Boss Fight and Guide
content: He'll leap backward after this, sprouting a lot more bony projectiles to throw at you in a concentrated burst. Like before, they can be dodged or even deflected with your staff spin (but they will eat up a lot of stamina).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Duskveil.md', within the main section titled 'The Duskveil', specifically from the subsection 'The Duskveil Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He'll leap backward after this, sprouting a lot more bony projectiles to throw at you in a concentrated burst. Like before, they can be dodged or even deflected with your staff spin (but they will eat up a lot of stamina).
